oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Young Guns: We'll Make You Famous!
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Basketball; Basketball players; Athletes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Members of the Christian Brothers Buccaneer Basketball team of 1991-1992 posed together with cowboy hats and long guns (L-R): Chad Becker, Shayne McGaughy, Christopher Avery, Brent Addison, Joey Ozment, Corey Champion, Mike Rezek.
